Metadata Management as a Strategic Imperative
Responsible for Information Management needs of the company. This division includes the following areas - Data Warehouse, Business Intelligence, Enterprise Architecture and Application Support

In charge of IT at Alta (a Solar PV start-up that is funded by key VCs such as KP, etc.), I was responsible for both strategy and implementation of key IT systems, moving the company's infrastructure through a period rapid growth. Some of my accomplishments include:- Taking the time to understand the business needs and establishing astrategy around what needs immediate attention versus can be pushedout over time.- Selecting a managed services vendor to handle our server and PC environment.- Choosing which systems to bring in-house (such as e-mail, CMS etc.)versus which systems would be best left to a SaaS provider (such asProcurement).- Designing and implementing a core VM infrastructure that comprises of4 physical servers and 12 virtual servers keeping in mind today'sneeds but also allowing for easy scalability.- Choosing and implementing a CMS solution : Documentum for Contentmanagement as well as Business Process Management.- Building an in-house SQL server application to collect key engineering data.- Finding the right outsource IT partners for infrastructuremanagement as well as CMS and database needs.- Establishing policies where required while keeping IT nimble and flexible.

Sunder Srinivasan is a remarkable human being with keen business instincts and amazing interpersonal skills.  One only needs to meet Sunder once to realize that they are in the presence of an extraordinary person.  With remarkable patience and a soft smile he handles business issues quickly and effectively. Anyone fortunate enough to work with or know Sunder will leave a better person. I strongly recommend Sunder as a business partner.

Naveen Mysore
Development Manager at Charles Schwab
March 30, 2009, Naveen worked with Sunder in different groups

I worked with Sunder on a Mentoring program sponsored by Schwab. Sunder was the co-chair of this group where we mentored a few of Schwab’s employee. His strengths are• Leadership – ability to help the group focus on the correct tasks and delegating them appropriately• Motivation – the mentoring program was a volunteer effort. Sunder provided the motivation to the team (comprising of the coordinators, mentors and mentees) and helped it come to a successful completion. The mentoring program got rave reviews from both mentors and mentees. • Enthusiastic and hard-working : Sunder always has a positive outlook and brings along a lot of enthusiasm to the team. Though Sunder was busy being a co-chair, he took on the extra responsibility to mentor another employee, which exemplifies his hard-working and mentoring capabilities.• Presentation skills – Sunder demonstrated excellent communication, both written and oral. His crisp messages provided a good status of the program to all the stake holders, and also helped communicate the importance and benefits of such mentoring programs to the management.

Syd Robenseifner
Independent Consultant, Software Executive, Strategic Planning, Product Management, Project Management
March 26, 2009, Syd worked with Sunder in different groups

Sunder is a consummate professional and team player.  He is a strategic thinker and an excellent business partner.  His strong technical background complements his business orientation and management skills, as he is able to make sound decisions about how technology should be used most effectively to meet business objectives.  He is able to determine which project needs resources most when there is a limitation of resources and an excess of requirements.  He is an active participant in projects and on teams; he makes the time to understand the issues; he researches situations in order to make solid decisions; and he is generous with his time.  You can always count on Sunder to make himself available when he needs to be, and to ensure that a project has the appropriate resources from his team.  He delegates effectively and participates appropriately.  He is an asset to any organization.

Sanjay Bajaj
Vice President at Oracle Financial Software Services Limited
April 9, 2015, Sunder was a client of Sanjay’s

Sanjay Bajaj and I have known and worked with each other for close to 5 years in his role as Head of Delivery at OFSS. Sanjay performed the role very well. He was always approachable, really listens to any concerns that are brought up and quick to act to resolve any issues. I really appreciate his direct conversations. His only aim is to ensure that we deal with any concerns that arise. He gets to know everyone he insteracts with on a personal basis and as such, he is able to command the respect at all levels of the org. Sanjay had a sizable group and set of clients, but he always cared about the individuals in his team. I am greatfuul for his partnership and recommend him strongly for positions such as this.

Mohit Tandon (COP)
Banking and Financial Services at Tata Consultancy Services
October 22, 2014, Sunder was a client of Mohit’s

It is a pleasure to recommend Mohit Tandon. I was introduced to Mohit three years ago as we were looking for a new outsource partner for our technology needs. Mohit was the key engagement manager and right from the first day, Mohit showed a keen interest on understanding our needs and showcasiing the capabilities of his organization. He has a keen sense of both individuals thought processes and technology aspects. He is able to address issues as they arise. Mohit is a true partner. Not only did he introduce us to the initial engagement, he was the go to person for the next year plus as we were establishing the relationship. Above all these qualities, he has a calm, composed demeanor and can work through difficult situations. I trust his intentions implicitly and would look forward to an future opportunities to work with him.

summary: Innovative IT Executive with 20 years' experience in Decision Support, Business Intelligence, MIS, Database Marketing, Business Analysis and Data Warehousing. Proven success leading teams in solving analytical needs of diverse customer groups such as Strategy, Finance, Marketing, Sales and Operations. Keen ability to study existing analytical problems and devise a clear data management strategy. Experienced in creating a strong organizational structure and building a reporting suite that spans dashboards for senior executives, OLAP for analysts, BI for sales & marketing and automated reports for operational teams. Strong leadership skills, executive presence, and a unique talent to understand both business and IT, translating customer needs into technology solutions.Specialties: Business Intelligence/OLAP: Business Objects, SQL Services Analysis services.Database Management: Oracle, Teradata.Software: PL SQL, SQL Navigator, Base SAS, SAS STAT,  SAS OR, JCL, TSO/ISPF, Synsort.
